A61/A616 Underground statutory apparatus diversion route with various closures in place east and westbound Diversion route in place Phase 1: Closure of the A61 Northbound and Southbound between Westwood Roundabout and the Junction with Wentworth way and Church Lane - All traffic to be diverted via Maple Road and Wentworth Way in both directions. Phase 2: Closure of the A616 between Westwood Roundabout at the A616/A61 junction and Newton Chambers roundabout at M1 J35A - All eastbound traffic to be diverted via the A61 northbound to M1 J36. Traffic will then turn right onto the M1 southbound and continue with their journey. All westbound traffic wanting to enter the A616 at Newton chambers roundabout will be diverted via M1 J35A to M1 J35 where they will go around the junction and then up to M1 J36 where they will the exit M1 and turn left to the A61 towards Westwood roundabout. Phase 3: Closure of the A616 eastbound between the A616/A629 junction at Wortley and Westwood Roundabout and also the eastbound entry slip to the A616 from the A629 at Wortley Interchange - All traffic to be diverted via the A629 southbound, turning left onto the A61 northbound at the Crown Inn Junction, rejoining the A616 at Westwood Roundabout.
